casebody.data:
JAMES, et al.
v.
BARTLETT, et al. No. 602PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Michael Crowell, Raleigh, for William James, et al. Susan K. Nichols, Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Bartlett, et al. John R. Wallace, Joseph A. Newsome, Raleigh, for Atkinson and Cobb. Anita S. Earls, for Sumler, et al. Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, for State. Marshall Hurley, Greensboro, W. Wallace Respass, Jr., for Steve Troxler.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of March 2005 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."

*692Justices PARKER and EDMUNDS recused.
